data.title: Summary
data: Having 3 years of experience in full stack development
currently working on ReactJS for making displays and NodeJS (Express) for creating REST API’s
I am self-motivated and self-taught professional who likes to solve problems

data: Role & Responsibility: Attending client meetings, requirement analysis, design & development of web & android applications, creating REST API’s, deployment of application on play store or azure
